Secondary - Examine RR , progression-free survival ( PFS ) , overall survival ( OS ) PTEN-deficient PTEN-expressing cancer , treatment arm . OUTLINE : Tissue microarray slide collect earlier ECOG-E5397 immunostained PTEN antibody analyze AQUA .
